caption: This video is about an investigative public hearing where a gentleman, being a media mogul, is questioned about his relationship with the head of the British government. He denies any influence over the British Prime Minister and explains that his seven meetings on Downing Street were merely upon invitation, refusing to disclose the topics discussed. However, the chairman of the inquiry committee still questions whether his frequent contacts with the British Prime Minister are appropriate as a foreigner. Outside the hearing, the gentleman is accused by a woman of having an inappropriate relationship with her 15-year-old daughter and possessing their correspondence and photographs, trying to extort him with these. He denies all the allegations and tries to threaten the woman but ultimately fails.
